name: Sunset Blade Kickstarter Demo
description:
SEE THE KICKSTARTER PAGE:

>>>[link will go here when the page goes live]<<<

  • Sunset Blade is a roleplaying game for Windows that draws inspiration from games such as the Dragon Quest series, Lufia, and Shin Megami Tensei.
  • Play as Yu, an intrepid little cat setting off with a band of misfits on a grand adventure to explore the world, help random strangers, steal their treasures, and experience life to the fullest!
  • Explore an extensive, kitty-inhabited world! Brave the challenges of dangerous dungeons and caves, orchestrate heists upon treasure laden manors and banks, and experience the bustling of east-inspired cities!
  • In battle, Yu counts on the help of her crew: the mighty but crude warrior Wang, a misplaced mage named Casimir, and the grumpy priest Li. Each of them ready to battle with their exclusive abilities and elemental affinities.
